title: Subscription Cancellation
intro: We’re sorry to see you go! If you wish to cancel your subscription, please send us an email at
instructions: To facilitate the processing of your request, please include:

details.name: Your full name
details.email: The email address associated with your account
details.plan: The plan you subscribed to (monthly, quarterly, annual…)

legal.text: According to consumer protection regulations, you have a right to cancel your subscription at any time. However, as per Article L.221-28 of the French Consumer Code, some services fully provided before the end of the 14-day withdrawal period may not be refundable. If you have any questions, please contact us at
